Package weka.core.logging

Class OutputLogger

java.lang.Object
weka.core.logging.Logger

weka.core.logging.OutputLogger
All Implemented Interfaces:
RevisionHandler
public class OutputLogger
extends FileLogger
A logger that logs all output on stdout and stderr to a file.
